name: openai_chatkit_frontend
description: Skills for creating and managing OpenAI ChatKit frontend components

skills.name: create_chatkit_ui_component
skills.description: Create a React component for the ChatKit UI

skills.name: create_chatkit_hook
skills.description: Create a React hook for managing ChatKit connections

skills.name: create_chatkit_session
skills.description: Create a ChatKit session using the backend API

skills.name: generate_chatkit_integration_code
skills.description: Generate code for integrating ChatKit into the frontend

skills.name: write_chatkit_component_to_file
skills.description: Write a ChatKit component to a file

examples.name: Create ChatKit UI Component
examples.description: Creates a ChatKitUI React component with default props

examples.name: Create useChatKit Hook
examples.description: Creates a useChatKit React hook for managing connections

examples.name: Create ChatKit Session
